content:
The even / odd class names of the Backdrop field display seem strange to me:

<div class="field ...>
  <div class="field-items">
    <div class="field-item even">...</div>
    <div class="field-item odd">...</div>
  </div>
</div>

Shouldn't the first field item have the class odd, and the second even?
Are you starting the counting from 0 or 1? :wink:
Well, at least Views starts with 1: <div class="views-row views-row-1 odd first ...">
FWIW, I would also expect the first rendered row to be starting with "odd".
